name: Zombies war (itch)
description:
The best zombie game.

Free arcade game.

This is a easy touch and funny game.

The gameplay style of this app is very simple.

Challenge your friends and complete all the levels.

Download the best addicting game on the play store.

Save the world in this game from zombies and vampires.

They are coming to destroy your homes and cities.

This game contains 30 unique and interesting levels.

This game contains sling shot and bowling ball.

You have to throw the ball with sling shot and cut the rope of TNT to kill the zombies.

It is very easy and addicting game.

So be Hero and save the world.
